tgt_original: sati samanugate lakṣaṇe prathamaṃ tadeva nirūpaṇiyam |
svārthaṃ jñānātmakaṃ parārthaṃ tu vacanātmakam,  tadenayorvisajātīyayornaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭate |  tat prathamaṃ vibhajyaiva tayorlakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti yukto vibhāgaḥ |
utpattimattvamavyatiriktaviśeṣaṇaṃ,  kṛtakatvaṃ vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇam x x x x x yasmādapekṣitaparavyāpāraḥ kṛtaka ucyate tasmād vyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ ucyate |
